vote.title: Authorize a fourth amendment to the Tax Increment Development, Chapter 380 Grant, and Chapter 380 Loan Agreement (“2018 TIF/Chapter 380 Agreement”) with WCWRD Inc and its affiliates or subsidiaries (“Developer”), approved as to form by the City Attorney, related to the Reimagine RedBird Mall Redevelopment Project (“Project”), now known as the Shops at RedBird, generally located at the southeast corner of Camp Wisdom Road and Westmoreland Road in the Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District, specifically including modifications to Section 2.C(7), Section 2.D(2), and Section 5.E as further described below, and any modifications to any other associated Project documents as may be necessary to effectuate the specific modifications described below; and as consideration for the fourth amendment, increase the Developer’s minimum Investment Requirement by $15,000,000.00 for the Project from $135,000,000.00 to $150,000,000.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize a fourth amendment to the Tax Increment Development, Chapter 380 Grant, and Chapter 380 Loan Agreement (“2018 TIF/Chapter 380 Agreement”) with WCWRD Inc and its affiliates or subsidiaries (“Developer”), approved as to form by the City Attorney, related to the Reimagine RedBird Mall Redevelopment Project (“Project”), now known as the Shops at RedBird, generally located at the southeast corner of Camp Wisdom Road and Westmoreland Road in the Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District, specifically including modifications to Section 2.C(7), Section 2.D(2), and Section 5.E as further described below, and any modifications to any other associated Project documents as may be necessary to effectuate the specific modifications described below; and as consideration for the fourth amendment, increase the Developer’s minimum Investment Requirement by $15,000,000.00 for the Project from $135,000,000.00 to $150,000,000.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
